# ATELIER - Fashion Storefront

## Business Information
- Name: ATELIER
- Type: Single-vendor online fashion store
- Target Audience: Style-conscious shoppers aged 18-40
- Focus: Curated fashion for the modern wardrobe

## Site Structure
- Homepage: Product catalog with hero section
- Product Pages: Detailed product information with variants and images
- Shopping Cart: Persistent cart with checkout flow
- Account: Order history and profile management
- Admin: Product, order, and return management dashboard

## Key Features
- Product catalog with variants (size, color, material)
- Search with typo tolerance
- Faceted filtering (category, brand, price, availability)
- Personalized recommendations
- Order tracking and returns
- Secure authentication via Internet Identity

## Product Categories
Fashion items including clothing and accessories across various categories and brands.

## Customer Service
- 30-day return policy
- Order tracking available
- Secure checkout process
- Multiple delivery options

## Technical
- Built on Internet Computer blockchain
- Decentralized architecture
- Secure identity management
